column3: my favorite restaurant in Houston.  The only drawback is that it is difficult to get a reservation.  If you're lucky enough to score a few seats at the small bar
column4: sit there for dinner.  The bartenders are awesome and they'll definitely lead you in the right direction for food.   If you have the time and budget is not an issue
column5: sit down at the bar and let them order for you until you're full.  They'll also offer suggestions on wine and sake pairings with your food.
